description: Enable integration of WezTerm terminal emulator with external tools and resources through the Model Context Protocol. Enhance your terminal experience by allowing dynamic access to data and actions via MCP. Simplify automation and context-aware workflows within WezTerm.

tools.name: write_to_terminal
tools.description: Writes text to the active WezTerm pane - often used to run commands

command.description: The command to run or text to write to the terminal

tools.name: read_terminal_output
tools.description: Reads output from the active WezTerm pane

lines.description: Number of lines to read from the terminal (default: 50)

tools.name: send_control_character
tools.description: Sends control characters to the active WezTerm pane

character.description: Control character to send (e.g., 'c' for Ctrl+C)

tools.name: list_panes
tools.description: Lists all panes in the current WezTerm window

tools.name: switch_pane
tools.description: Switches to a specific pane in WezTerm

pane_id.description: ID of the pane to switch to

tools.name: write_to_specific_pane
tools.description: Writes text to a specific WezTerm pane by pane ID

command.description: The command to run or text to write to the terminal

pane_id.description: ID of the pane to write to
